2022.title: Floating Artificial Leaf
2022.description: Researchers have developed floating ‘artificial leaves’ that generate clean fuels from sunlight and water, and could eventually operate on a large scale at sea.

2022.title: DUBTAC platform
2022.description: The Deubiquitinase Targeting Chimera (DUBTAC) platform was developed to therapeutically target degraded proteins by removing ubiquitin chains from specific proteins to stop their degradation and stabilize their levels for therapeutic benefit.

2022.title: Form Bio
2022.description: Form Bio's easy to use bioinformatics platform simplifies data analysis and management using pre-built workflows.

2022.title: PASTE
2022.description: PASTE (Programmable Addition via Site-specific Targeting Elements), has a Cas9 enzyme that cuts at a specific genomic site, guided by a strand of RNA that binds to that site.

2022.title: Avidity Sequencing platform
2022.description: Avidity Sequencing separately optimizes the process of stepping along a DNA template and the process of identifying each nucleotide within the template.
